languages.text: The first use of a heroic act or a desperate measure grants each party member the {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}welfare and prosperity{/g} or {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}resolute judgement{/g} effect, respectively. The effect is triggered once per combat and lasts until the end of combat. If one of the effects is triggered, the other becomes unavailable.

traits.locale_text:
First use of Heroic Act or Desperature Measure by either Rogue Trader or any of his allies applies the correspondent effect to everyone in the active party: {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}Heroic Legacy{/g} or {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}Desperate Legacy{/g}.
The effect triggers once per combat and is applied until the end of it.

The first use of a heroic act or a desperate measure grants each party member the {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}welfare and prosperity{/g} or {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}steadfastness in decisions{/g} effect, respectively. The effect is triggered once per combat and lasts until the end of combat. If one of the effects is triggered, another becomes unavailable.

The first use of a heroic act or a desperate measure grants each party member the {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}welfare and prosperity{/g} or {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}steadfastness in decisions{/g} effect, respectively. The effect is triggered once per combat and lasts until the end of combat. If one of the effects is triggered, another becomes unavailable.

The first use of a heroic act or a desperate measure grants each party member the {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}welfare and prosperity{/g} or {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}resolute judgement {/g} effect, respectively. The effect is triggered once per combat and lasts until the end of combat. If one of the effects is triggered, the other becomes unavailable.

The first use of a heroic act or a desperate measure grants each party member the {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}welfare and prosperity{/g} or {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}resolute judgement {/g} effect, respectively. The effect is triggered once per combat and lasts until the end of combat. If one of the effects is triggered, the other becomes unavailable.

languages.text: El primer uso de un acto heroico o medida desesperada otorga a todos los miembros del grupo el efecto {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}bienestar y prosperidad{/g} o {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}juicio firme{/g}, respectivamente. Este efecto se activa una vez por combate y dura hasta el final del mismo. Si se activa uno de los efectos, no puede activarse el otro.
languages.original_text: The first use of a heroic act or a desperate measure grants each party member the {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}welfare and prosperity{/g} or {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}resolute judgement{/g} effect, respectively. The effect is triggered once per combat and lasts until the end of combat. If one of the effects is triggered, the other becomes unavailable.

traits.locale_text: El primer uso de un acto heroico o medida desesperada otorga a todos los miembros del grupo el efecto {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}bienestar y prosperidad{/g} o {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}juicio firme{/g}, respectivamente. Este efecto se activa una vez por combate y dura hasta el final del mismo. Si se activa uno de los efectos, no puede activarse el otro.

languages.text: 英雄的行為または非常手段の初回使用で、各部隊メンバーにそれぞれ{g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}幸福と繁栄{/g}または{g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}断固たる判断{/g}効果を与える。効果は1戦闘に1回発動し、戦闘が終了するまで継続する。効果の1つが発動すると、もう一方は利用不可になる。
languages.original_text: The first use of a heroic act or a desperate measure grants each party member the {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}welfare and prosperity{/g} or {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}resolute judgement{/g} effect, respectively. The effect is triggered once per combat and lasts until the end of combat. If one of the effects is triggered, the other becomes unavailable.

traits.locale_text: 英雄的行為または非常手段の初回使用で、各部隊メンバーにそれぞれ{g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}幸福と繁栄{/g}または{g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}断固たる判断{/g}効果を与える。効果は1戦闘に1回発動し、戦闘が終了するまで継続する。効果の1つが発動すると、もう一方は利用不可になる。

languages.text: 任意角色在战斗中首次使用英雄壮举或背水一战时，会分别赋予所有盟友{g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}欣欣向荣{/g}或{g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}坚毅果决{/g}效果。此效果每场战斗只能触发一次，持续至战斗结束。当其中一种效果触发之后，另一种效果将无法触发。
languages.original_text: The first use of a heroic act or a desperate measure grants each party member the {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}welfare and prosperity{/g} or {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}resolute judgement{/g} effect, respectively. The effect is triggered once per combat and lasts until the end of combat. If one of the effects is triggered, the other becomes unavailable.

traits.locale_text: 任意角色在战斗中首次使用英雄壮举或背水一战时，会分别赋予所有盟友{g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}欣欣向荣{/g}或{g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}坚毅果决{/g}效果。此效果每场战斗只能触发一次，持续至战斗结束。当其中一种效果触发之后，另一种效果将无法触发。

languages.text: Der erste Einsatz einer Helden- oder Verzweiflungstat gewährt jedem Gruppenmitglied den Effekt {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}Wohlstand und Wohlergehen{/g} oder {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}Resolutes Urteil{/g}. Der Effekt wird einmal pro Kampf ausgelöst und hält bis zum Ende des Kampfes an. Wird einer der Effekte ausgelöst, ist der andere nicht verfügbar.
languages.original_text: The first use of a heroic act or a desperate measure grants each party member the {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}welfare and prosperity{/g} or {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}resolute judgement{/g} effect, respectively. The effect is triggered once per combat and lasts until the end of combat. If one of the effects is triggered, the other becomes unavailable.

traits.locale_text: Der erste Einsatz einer Helden- oder Verzweiflungstat gewährt jedem Gruppenmitglied den Effekt {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}Wohlstand und Wohlergehen{/g} oder {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}Resolutes Urteil{/g}. Der Effekt wird einmal pro Kampf ausgelöst und hält bis zum Ende des Kampfes an. Wird einer der Effekte ausgelöst, ist der andere nicht verfügbar.

languages.text: À la première utilisation d'un acte héroïque ou d'une mesure désespérée, chaque membre du groupe bénéficie de l'effet {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}Bien-être et prospérité{/g} ou {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}Jugement sans appel{/g} respectivement. L'effet peut se déclencher une fois par rencontre et dure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Activer l'un des effets empêche de pouvoir activer l'autre.
languages.original_text: The first use of a heroic act or a desperate measure grants each party member the {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}welfare and prosperity{/g} or {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}resolute judgement{/g} effect, respectively. The effect is triggered once per combat and lasts until the end of combat. If one of the effects is triggered, the other becomes unavailable.

traits.locale_text: À la première utilisation d'un acte héroïque ou d'une mesure désespérée, chaque membre du groupe bénéficie de l'effet {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}Bien-être et prospérité{/g} ou {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}Jugement sans appel{/g} respectivement. L'effet peut se déclencher une fois par rencontre et dure jusqu'à la fin du combat. Activer l'un des effets empêche de pouvoir activer l'autre.

languages.text: Первое применение героического акта или отчаянных мер в бою дает каждому члену отряда эффект {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}благосостояние и процветание{/g} или {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}непоколебимость в решениях{/g} соответственно. Эффект применяется только один раз за бой и длится до конца боя. При применении одного эффекта второй становится недоступен.
languages.original_text: The first use of a heroic act or a desperate measure grants each party member the {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}welfare and prosperity{/g} or {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}resolute judgement{/g} effect, respectively. The effect is triggered once per combat and lasts until the end of combat. If one of the effects is triggered, the other becomes unavailable.

traits.locale_text: Первое применение героического акта или отчаянных мер в бою дает каждому члену отряда эффект {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}благосостояние и процветание{/g} или {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}непоколебимость в решениях{/g} соответственно. Эффект применяется только один раз за бой и длится до конца боя. При применении одного эффекта второй становится недоступен.

Первое применение героического акта или отчаянных мер в бою дает каждому члену отряда эффект {g|f:2f93d13e3d734f1982a8424c22c372ef}благосостояние и процветание{/g} или {g|f:8e9345fed2dd42d3b22665d2cfab5f85}непоколебимость в решениях{/g} соответственно. Эффект применяется только один раз за бой и длится до конца боя. При применении одного эффекта второй становится недоступен.
